description: The file is a Dart source file for a Flutter application implementing a notes organizer app. It contains core application logic, including UI widgets, state management with provider, local database handling with sqflite, and search functionality.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Model class representing a single note with attributes: id, title, content, createdAt, updatedAt, and methods for conversion to/from Map for database storage.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based provider managing the collection of notes, including loading from database, adding, updating, deleting, and searching notes.

classes.name: NotesListScreen
classes.description: Main widget displaying the list of notes with search and add functionalities.

classes.name: NotesSearchDelegate
classes.description: Custom SearchDelegate enabling search/filtering of notes by title or content.

classes.name: NoteEditScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget for creating/editing notes with form validation and delete option.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entrypoint that runs the Flutter app with NotesApp as root widget.

methods.name: _initDb
methods.description: Initializes and creates the database if it does not exist.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Loads notes from the database and updates state.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Adds a new note to the database and the local list.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note in the database and in the list.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note from the database and the local list.

methods.name: setSearchQuery
methods.description: Sets the current search query for filtering notes.

methods.name: _NoteCopy.copyWith
methods.description: Helper method to copy a Note object with optional new fields.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Widget build methods for UI components like main app, note list, and editing screens.

methods.name: _saveNote
methods.description: Handles save action, validating form, updating database, and navigating back.

methods.name: _deleteBackground
methods.description: Builds the background widget shown during swipe-to-delete.
